select c.* from (select ROWNUM rn, b.* from (select d.* from (select a.board_no, a.zip, a.addr, a.deta_addr, a.area, a.lend_str_date, a.lend_end_date, a.lend_price, a.reg_date, a.reg_stts, a.mem_no, a.dst1, a.dst2, LISTAGG(a.mcrp, ', ') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY a.mcrp) AS mcrp from (select e.*, f.code_desct as mcrp from (select f.board_no, f.zip, f.addr, f.deta_addr, f.area, f.lend_str_date, f.lend_end_date, f.lend_price, f.reg_date, f.reg_stts, f.mem_no, f.dst1, f.dst2, m.mcrp as code from farm_lend f left join main_crops m on f.board_no = m.board_no
) e join common_code_detail f on e.code= f.CMMN_deta_code ) a group by a.board_no, a.zip, a.addr, a.deta_addr, a.area, a.lend_str_date, a.lend_end_date, a.lend_price, a.reg_date, a.reg_stts, a.mem_no, a.dst1, a.dst2 ) d
where mcrp like (select '%'|| code_desct ||'%' from common_code_detail where cmmn_deta_code = #{mcrp})
order by reg_date desc) b
where ROWNUM <= #{page} * 9) c where c.rn > (#{page} - 1) * 9
